title: New Sonic Movie Trailer Gets Its Fixed Looks - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.12.19(Ad-Free)
description:
To get 10% off AND free shipping, go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box!

Imran and Fran are back to talk Sonic’s new movie trailer, EA pulling back on Fallen Order early access and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:04 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Kansas City community of best friends is having a meetup at Tapcade on November 16th. Details @KindaFunnyKC.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mathew, Carolina, Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:00 - New Sonic the Hedgehog trailer reveals the speedster’s redesign
00:17:15 - Monster Energy Stock Rose with Death Stranding Release
00:31:02 - Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order won't get EA Access early trial
00:32:09 - “Do you feel like more games will follow Star Wars: Fallen Order and not have an Early Access to prevent spoilers?” - BJ Bernardo
00:36:14 - Nintendo announces digital sales are way up
00:45:17 - Out today
00:47:52 -  Brooklinen
00:49:00 - Manscaped
00:51:25 - Escape The Invasion
Reader mail   -
00:52:21 - “I purchased my founders edition of Google Stadia on June 06, 2019 at 11:29 AM and that is that last time Google contacted me about it.” - Ray Briggs II
00:55:03 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
